synopsis.text:
One last battle awaits Nurse Komugi as she confronts her nemesis, Magical Maid Koyori, who has successfully unleashed a virus on a global scale, bringing Komugi to the brink of defeat. As a magical nurse, Komugi has been instrumental in thwarting the widespread contamination of harmful viruses unleashed by the nefarious Ungrar, a task she cannot afford to fail in. With the help of her magical rabbit companion, Mugimaru, can Komugi rise to the occasion and save humanity once more?

Amidst her flourishing career as an idol, Komugi finds herself constantly at odds with her rival, Megumi, much to the delight of their adoring fans. However, this rivalry takes a backseat when Magical Maid Koyori emerges with a sinister plan to infect the city with peculiar viruses, transforming its citizens into humorous internet characters. Determined to put an end to this chaos, Komugi undergoes a magical transformation into Nurse Witch Komugi, ready to face off against the mischievous, cat-eared Koyori. Will Komugi succeed in vanquishing Koyori and banishing Angrar, the king of viruses, back to Vaccine World? The fate of the world rests in her capable hands.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
